name: sogebot
description: Free Twitch Bot built on Node.js
author: Michal Orlik <sogehige@gmail.com>

scripts.standard: standard main.js && standard libs/* && standard libs/systems/* && standard libs/overlays/* && standard libs/widgets/*
scripts.build-zip: npm run cleanup:dist; rm -rf node_modules; rm npm-shrinkwrap.json; npm install; npm shrinkwrap; echo Removing sogeBot-$npm_package_version.zip; rm sogeBot-$npm_package_version.zip; echo Creating new sogeBot-$npm_package_version.zip; zip -qr sogeBot-$npm_package_version.zip npm-shrinkwrap.json config.example.json libs/ locales/ main.js public/ launch.sh LICENSE migrate.js package.json README.md tools/ bin/ bat/
scripts.test: npm run standard && npm run test:config && mocha && npm run test:revert
scripts.test:config: cp config.json config.backup.json > /dev/null; cp config.example.json config.json
scripts.start: node ./tools/migrate && npm run copy:dist && node ./main || true
